channel.title: lapply on Lulliter
channel.description: Recent content in lapply on Lulliter

item.title: Working with project's directories and lists of files in R
item.description: Here I want to collect a few useful R code chunks that I execute common tasks when I compile a complex research project with several sub-folders organizing the content. A very common goal is to lead in the environment all the files stored in a certain subdirectory of the project
